div.p: Phylogenetic tree of the Zygaenidae used in this study. Branch labels represent bootstrap values for 1000 replicates; the scale bar corresponds to genetic distances between sequences, along branch lengths. Image credits: T. amphellophaga, adapted from www.lepinet.fr/especes/nation/lep/index.php?id=02140, ©Daniel Morel; all other images authors’ own
